Name: Francisco
description:
Francisco is a humble and hardworking 36-year-old married man and a father of eight children. He works in agriculture, and he grows many types of vegetables on his farm. After his vegetables are grown and ripe, he will harvest and bring them to market to sell. He has been planting vegetables for 13 years now with his own working capital.

He is requesting a loan of $600 through KIF to help him improve his business. Every day, he is doing his activities by planting and looking after his vegetables because he makes a living from it and earns a good income for his loving family. Francisco plans to use this loan to buy more manure, other vegetable seeds and some new farming equipment in order to increase the amount of vegetables in the next coming harvest.
